channel.title: Complete all quests while logged in first time
channel.description: i want it, so that all quests are complete when somebody starts. how can i change it so when u log in u start with all questes done?

item.title: Complete all quests while logged in first time
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Nader Owner Nader
item.description:
@Owner_Nader wrote:

[quote=“smkscape, post:11, topic:285175”]There are q1=0; in player class to ? you have to chnage that in 15 the 0[/quote]No just change the q1 = 0 to 15 in player.java

Read full topic

item.title: Complete all quests while logged in first time
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Nader Owner Nader
item.description:
@Owner_Nader wrote:

[quote=“Your Master, post:8, topic:285175”][quote author=burnt w pwnt link=topic=376886.msg2838881#msg2838881 date=1245848110]
i want it, so that all quests are complete when somebody starts.
how can i change it so when u log in u start with all questes done?
[/quote]Did you ever heard about a search bar? But since im posting a comment I can well post how to do it:

in client.java search for:

q1 = 15; q2 = 0; q3 = 0; q4 = 0; q5 = 0; q6 = 0; q7 = 0; q8 = 0; q9 = 0; q10 = 0; q11 = 0; q12 = 0;

Change it so it look like:

q1 = 15; q2 = 15; q3 = 15; q4 = 15; q5 = 15; q6 = 15; q7 = 15; q8 = 15; q9 = 15; q10 = 15; q11 = 15; q12 = 15;

Hope this helped your problem.[/quote]Lol thats what i said, but hes frozen and confused i guess

Read full topic
item.source: Complete all quests while logged in first time

item.title: Complete all quests while logged in first time
item.dc:creator: @Your_Master Your Master
item.description:
@Your_Master wrote:

[quote=“burnt w pwnt, post:1, topic:285175”]i want it, so that all quests are complete when somebody starts.
how can i change it so when u log in u start with all questes done?[/quote]Did you ever heard about a search bar? But since im posting a comment I can well post how to do it:

in client.java search for:

q1 = 15; q2 = 0; q3 = 0; q4 = 0; q5 = 0; q6 = 0; q7 = 0; q8 = 0; q9 = 0; q10 = 0; q11 = 0; q12 = 0;

Change it so it look like:

q1 = 15; q2 = 15; q3 = 15; q4 = 15; q5 = 15; q6 = 15; q7 = 15; q8 = 15; q9 = 15; q10 = 15; q11 = 15; q12 = 15;

Hope this helped your problem.

Read full topic
